title: Perfect pot roast
ingredients: ['1 tsp extra virgin olive oil', '1 kg (2Â¼ lb) piece boneless beef chuck, about 7.5 cm (3 in) thick, trimmed of fat and tied', '2 large onions, finely chopped', '1 celery stick, finely chopped', '3 garlic cloves, crushed', '250ml (8 fl oz) dry red or white wine', '1 tin chopped tomatoes', '1 large carrot, grated', '1 tsp chopped fresh thyme', '450ml (3/4 pint) beef stock', '600g (1 lb 5 oz) new potatoes, scrubbed and quartered', '1 celeriac, peeled and cut into 2.5 cm (1 in) cubes', '1 swede, peeled and cut into 2.5 cm (1 in) cubes', '4 carrots, sliced', 'salt and pepper', '3 tbsp chopped parsley to garnish']
